snippet.title: Let's Play Out of Sight - Romantic Visual Novel
snippet.description:
Let's Play Out of Sight - Romantic Visual Novel
Play it yourself:  https://summerfoundme.wordpress.com/out-of-sight/
When Lina decided to go to the park to finish reading a book she couldn’t have anticipated that misplacing her glasses could lead to paranormal encounters.

From the creator of "Summer Found Me" (which I loved), comes Out of Sight.  A heart touching story of two strangers who meet that is... wait for it.... Out of Sight.  Muah ah ha ha ha!!!!

The game contains ~14,800 words, two main paths and 7 total endings (6 endings + 1 special ending unclocked after completing the rest.)
